hero.title: AI-Powered
hero.description: Advanced medical diagnosis, doctor recommendations, and comprehensive health insights powered by artificial intelligence.

search.title: Search Healthcare Providers
search.symptomPlaceholder: Describe your symptoms... (e.g., headache, fever, chest pain)
search.doctorPlaceholder: Search doctors by name, specialty, or location
search.testCenterPlaceholder: Search test centers by name, services, or location
search.hospitalPlaceholder: Search hospitals by name, services, or location

results.searchFailed: Search failed. Please check if the backend server is running.
results.tryAdjustingSearch: Try adjusting your search terms or browse all available options.
results.noSuggestionsFound: No doctor suggestions found for your symptoms.

features.title: Complete Healthcare Ecosystem
features.subtitle: Advanced AI-powered platform bridging the gap between patients and healthcare providers
features.feature1Desc: Enter your symptoms and get matched with the right specialists, nearby doctors, and test centers using AI-powered recommendations.
features.feature2Desc: Upload prescriptions and health documents. Our AI explains diagnoses in simple terms and suggests next steps for better care.
features.feature3Desc: Automated creation of your personal health timeline and knowledge graph from uploaded documents and medical history.
features.chatbotDesc: AI-powered assistant using your health data
features.dashboardDesc: Visualize health trends and diagnosis timeline
features.doctorPortalDesc: Professionals can access structured patient data
features.costDesc: Estimate treatment costs and required tests

footer.description: Your trusted AI-powered healthcare companion. Advanced medical insights, doctor recommendations, and comprehensive health management at your fingertips.

errors.failedLoadDoctors: Failed to load doctors. Please check if the backend server is running.

errors.failedLoadTestCenters: Failed to load test centers CSV
